title: Conditioned ItemGroup executes Remove sometimes when it shouldn't
body:
See internal bug [AB#1217378](https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/1217378).

The attached small program shows the issue: there's a false condition, but the Remove gets used.

[MSBuild5766.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/files/5314569/MSBuild5766.zip)

This regressed between 16.6 and 16.7.
